e0c7d337-0e03-40a1-9450-fe80ebb85722.description: Earners have met all required coach training hours to become certified coaches through the ICF. Students who earn the Certificate in Professional and Executive Coaching will understand the core coaching competencies while applying coaching models and techniques. Earners understand ethical standards required within the coaching profession, how organizational culture can impact the development of a coaching practice, and research related to the field of professional and executive coaching.
e0c7d337-0e03-40a1-9450-fe80ebb85722.name: COB: Professional and Executive Coaching

alignments.name: International Coach Federation
alignments.description: Accredited Coaching Training Program (ACTP) accredited programs are considered “all inclusive” training programs, which offer start to finish coach training. A minimum of 125 student contact hours, Mentor Coaching and a performance evaluation process are required for ACTP approval.

badge_template_activities.title: ORGL-54600 Introduction to Professional and Executive Coaching

b9a8239b-c4db-4cd6-a940-9ff24c198dbb.description: The earner of this badge will have completed all five weeks of the Online Teaching Certification at Lewis University and demonstrated competencies in online course design, measurable learning objective creation, educational technology tools, and online student engagement strategies. Earners will be able to create online learning environments and assessments to meet course and modular learning objectives.
b9a8239b-c4db-4cd6-a940-9ff24c198dbb.name: Online Teaching Certification

4cf7e636-d856-4b51-9c35-0ff348eb1056.description: Leaders must engage in making critical decisions, leading efforts to change routines and policies, and motivating employees to do their best. Leaders must also negotiate between various parties and manage conflict. This micro-crednetial provides students with the opportunity to learn about and apply techniques that are foundational to effective leadership and which encourage and endorse the workforce while moving the organization toward adaptation and contemporary outcomes.
4cf7e636-d856-4b51-9c35-0ff348eb1056.name: COB: Organizational Leadership

7c84bafa-3e73-48fd-85cf-578a5e2f2543.description: Project management is both science and art. It is science in that it relies on proven and repeatable processes and techniques to achieve project success. It is an art because it also involves managing and relating to people and requires the project manager to apply intuitive skills in situations that are totally unique for each project.
7c84bafa-3e73-48fd-85cf-578a5e2f2543.name: COB Project Management

236fb4b7-e831-4173-8d2b-06ed4b00399d.description: Rapid advances in our ability to analyze data coupled with shifting demographics and changing lifestyles made healthcare data the principal asset for all organizations in this field. Healthcare oriented organizations such as insurance companies, hospital systems, independent clinics and other supporting service providers increasingly rely on healthcare informatics for both primary business operations as well as the support functions like accounting, finance, and others.
236fb4b7-e831-4173-8d2b-06ed4b00399d.name: COB: Healthcare Informatics

badge_template_activities.title: BSAN-67500 Introduction to Health Care Informatics

alignments.name: ACBSP
alignments.description: Our program is accredited by the Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs (ACBSP), with an emphasis on teaching and applied knowledge. The ACBSP focuses on tangible learning outcomes and quality improvement, especially as workforce demands change.

d39a1b4b-4d97-49bb-81d1-6f627ea5d934.description: More than ever, organizations are reliant on data for all critical operations. Business Analytics approaches provide the skills and tools for students to be proficient in analysis of business data for strategic decision making. Continuous technological advances transformed the organizational data, data about customers, competitors, and partners to a core strength and a competitive advantage. Accordingly, people with skills in business analytics are in high demand at all levels of organizations.
d39a1b4b-4d97-49bb-81d1-6f627ea5d934.name: COB: Business Analytics

badge_template_activities.title: BSAN-67900 Business Intelligence and Data Analysis
BSAN-54000 Data Mining for Business Decisions

745d04a3-1420-4753-89bc-c2bcf6a3aa83.description: Businesses must understand how to use digital marketing channels to effectively communicate with their consumers and make critical strategic decisions. This micro-credential provides students with the opportunities to learn and implement digital marketing strategies which include developing interesting ways to get the campaign’s message across, apply digital analytics to the organizations and make smarter, more effective data-backed decisions.sef
745d04a3-1420-4753-89bc-c2bcf6a3aa83.name: COB: Digital Marketing

aed2d24d-430e-4c73-98f7-aa2038fcc1ae.description: Financial management provides pathways to achieve goals and objectives in a business organization. To succeed in operating a business, managers must consider the potential consequences of their business decisions on capital structure, capital budgeting, risk management, etc. Students will be provided with opportunities to explore both theoretical foundations and practical applications in financial decision-making.
aed2d24d-430e-4c73-98f7-aa2038fcc1ae.name: COB: Financial Analysis

e778c250-6208-443e-8af7-2bea1257a10c.description: Students who earn the Certificate in Organizational Leadership will understand leadership theories and leadership as a psycho-social phenomenon, use critical thinking and decision making skills to enhance leadership and organizational effectiveness, develop foundational notions of ethical leadership with a focus on Lasallian and Servant Leadership, and recognize and appreciate the role of leadership in shaping organizational culture with particular emphasis on diversity, and self-reflection.
e778c250-6208-443e-8af7-2bea1257a10c.name: COB: Organizational Leadership Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: ORGL-50900 Leadership: Theories, Practices and Context
ORGL-53800 Conflict Management and Employee Engagement
ORGL-59100 Ethics, Critical Thinking and Decision Making

c7fadc7a-1601-4cf4-8df0-a0242694a4e0.description: Earners of this badge will be able to leverage various types of large-scale datasets to produce novel insights and support decision makers in generating optimal actions.
c7fadc7a-1601-4cf4-8df0-a0242694a4e0.name: CoAST: Data Mining (DM)

badge_template_activities.title: DATA-61000 Advanced Data Mining and Prescriptive Analytics

aa96cd5f-5562-4fbd-ab1c-f809e97712dc.description: Earners of this badge will possess the mathematical and computational skills and knowledge necessary for understanding many data science methods and being able to apply them to different domains.
aa96cd5f-5562-4fbd-ab1c-f809e97712dc.name: CoAST: Data Science Foundations (DSF)

badge_template_activities.title: Students can earn this badge by submitting transcripts showing sufficient undergraduate coursework and passing exam (for a fee) OR, take courses below
DATA-50100 Probability and Statistics for Data Scientists

e5f721f1-b640-4954-9b35-2e7b76cdcff8.description: Earners of this badge will possess skills to transform and clean datasets to prepare them for analysis; they will have knowledge that will allow them to perform statistical analysis of the data.
e5f721f1-b640-4954-9b35-2e7b76cdcff8.name: CoAST: Data Wrangling and Analysis (DWA)

87e10ffd-8fbb-40da-8747-9f68740e9303.description: Students who attain this certificate understand leadership theories and leadership as a psycho-social phenomenon, use critical thinking and decision making skills to enhance leadership and organizational effectiveness within higher education institutions, gain an awareness of existing systems and services along with future directions in higher education, and develop the ability to facilitate change in their organizations.
87e10ffd-8fbb-40da-8747-9f68740e9303.name: COB: Higher Education Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: ORGL-50900 Leadership: Theories, Practices and Context
ORGL-51600 Principles of Higher Education: Mission and Directions
ORGL-55600 Systems and Services in Higher Education

e30bfc5d-e867-4ba1-9160-58b426f45160.description: Students who earn the Certificate in Training and Development will understand the Association for Talent Development (ATD) Capability Model. The alignment of the curriculum to the ATD model ensures that our students develop in-demand skills with the potential to lead to ATD certification. This certificate prepares students for leadership roles in instructional design, training management, e-learning, performance improvement, consulting, and change management.
e30bfc5d-e867-4ba1-9160-58b426f45160.name: COB: Training and Development

badge_template_activities.title: ORGL-50900 Leadership: Theories, Practices and Context
ORGL-57700 Design and Delivery of Training
ORGL-57800 Managing and Implementing Training and Development Initiatives

f1ef863f-4ebe-4a8a-8213-ba16c621f091.description: This badge represents the successful completion of a forty-hour training course presented in compliance with the mediation Ethical Standards of Professional Responsibility (SPIDR). The training meets the requirements to practice basic mediation processes and qualification to apply for advanced mediation training programs.
f1ef863f-4ebe-4a8a-8213-ba16c621f091.name: Mediation

1c1b0204-074d-456b-843e-b2c6bce83a1d.description: Earners of this badge will be able to create intelligent systems that are able to reason with incoming data to generate optimal actions in uncertain environments; these systems can be used to replace or supplement human decision makers to increase performance using a data-driven approach.
1c1b0204-074d-456b-843e-b2c6bce83a1d.name: CoAST: Cognitive and Prescriptive Analysis (CPA)

badge_template_activities.title: DATA-61000 Advanced Data Mining and Prescriptive Analytics

5bee1a76-59f4-4b8b-b916-5bcb9fd6e80d.description: Earners of this badge will be able to make use of large-scale data to detect and counteract cybersecurity threats.
5bee1a76-59f4-4b8b-b916-5bcb9fd6e80d.name: CoAST: Cybersecurity Applications (CA)

badge_template_activities.title: DATA-62500 Data Mining for Cyber Security

efa0bc89-5b2c-4676-9d8a-291fa26e10d9.description: Earners of this badge will be able to create systems used to support data science workflows such as distributed systems and databases.
efa0bc89-5b2c-4676-9d8a-291fa26e10d9.name: CoAST: Data Engineering (DE)

badge_template_activities.title: CPSC-50900 Database Systems OR DATA-54000 Large-Scale Data Storage Systems

6c2ff7f2-8d0f-4400-b19d-653469de6dcf.description: Earners of this badge will be able to create and use optimal data visualizations necessary to support explorative data analysis and to present results of data modeling with mobile or web applications.
6c2ff7f2-8d0f-4400-b19d-653469de6dcf.name: CoAST: Data Visualization (DV)

f4969760-f22f-4ccf-8616-b97ddc60f6a8.description: Earners of this badge will be able to employ machine learning techniques that leverage large datasets for solving difficult predictive problems in a variety of domains.
f4969760-f22f-4ccf-8616-b97ddc60f6a8.name: CoAST: Machine Learning (ML)

114e659c-0234-49b9-acb6-170b14ace2a2.description: Earners of the Mathematical Modeling badge will be able to assess and articulate what type of modeling techniques are appropriate for a given physical system, construct a mathematical model of a given physical system and analyze it, make predictions of the behavior of a given physical system based on the analysis of its mathematical model.
114e659c-0234-49b9-acb6-170b14ace2a2.name: CoAST: Mathematical Modeling

badge_template_activities.title: MATH-12300 Modeling our World with Mathematics

cb1f9c5b-4568-4425-9043-4d5dda486bef.description: Earners of this badge will be able to work with various unstructured datasets such as text, images, video, and audio, in order to develop intelligent systems that can make decisions based on information contained in the data.
cb1f9c5b-4568-4425-9043-4d5dda486bef.name: CoAST: Text and Image Processing (TIP)

3c5f5e80-03e3-48f4-9431-4f5a101302ed.description: Earners of this badge will have a solid understanding of the current techniques and tools used in the industry for analytics oriented business decision making. They are capable of analyzing business data from multiple contexts, performing analysis to reveal underlying trends, visualize and present the findings as well as communicating business recommendations based on their analysis.
3c5f5e80-03e3-48f4-9431-4f5a101302ed.name: COB: Business Analytics Basics
